alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 11:50PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, Sedgwick, southwestern Butler and northern Sumner Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm winds over Eisenhower National Airport, or 6 miles northwest of Haysville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Douglass, Benton, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita, Kechi and Eastborough. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 16. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 30 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. There will be little or no rain with this wind. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
